translations.Personal activity feed for %s: Mlisho wa shughuli za kibinafsi kwa %s
translations.Your feed URL is invalid: URL ya mipasho yako ni batili
translations.Daily activity summary for %s: Muhtasari wa shughuli za kila siku kwa %s
translations.This application enables people to view: Programu hii inawawezesha watu kuona kumbukumbu ya shughuli zinazowahusu, faili zao au data nyingine.
translations.This app allows people to see actions re:
Programu hii inaruhusu watu kuona vitendo vinavyohusiana na faili na data zao katika Nextcloud.
		Kila mtu anaweza kusanidi mipangilio ya shughuli yake binafsi katika mipangilio ya kibinafsi,
		kuchagua ni shughuli gani inapaswa kusukumwa kwa simu za mkononi, kutumwa kupitia barua pepe
		au ikiwa muhtasari wa kila siku unatumwa kila asubuhi.
		Maelezo zaidi yanapatikana katika hati za Shughuli.
translations.You need to set up your email address be: Unahitaji kusanidi barua pepe yako kabla ya kupokea barua pepe za arifa.
translations.This stream will show events like additi: Mtiririko huu utaonyesha matukio kama vile nyongeza, mabadiliko na kushirikiwa
translations.RSS link copied to clipboard: Kiungo cha RSS kimenakiliwa kwenye ubao wa kunakili
translations.Could not copy the RSS link, please copy: Haikuweza kunakili kiungo cha RSS, tafadhali nakili wewe mwenyewe:
translations.Copy RSS feed link: Nakili kiungo cha mlisho wa RSS
translations.Choose for which activities you want to: Chagua kwa shughuli ambazo ungependa kupokea barua pepe au arifa kwa kushinikiza.
Chagua kwa shughuli ambazo ungependa kupata arifa kutoka kwa programu.
translations.Daily activity summary: Muhtasari wa shughuli za kila siku
translations.Send daily activity summary in the morni: Tuma muhtasari wa shughuli za kila siku asubuhi
translations.Configure the default notification setti: Sanidi mipangilio ya arifa chaguomsingi kwa akaunti mpya.
